title: The Circle catfish Beth exposed as she and Jack team up as new player after being blocked
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

The Circle lost two more players on Sunday night, but there was a major twist that those who were saved had no idea about.

Beth and Jack were voted the bottom two in the ratings, meaning they were immediately blocked from the game.

While Woody and Ella were named the new influencers, they didn't actually have to choose anyone to leave with catfish Beth and fellow newcomer Jack chosen in the recent vote.

The players were told that their former neighbours would be meeting before they left the show for good, with Beth and Jack then preparing themselves for the meeting.

(Image: Channel 4)

What the remaining players in The Circle didn't know though was that the duo now had the option of returning to the game.

The public had the choice of saving them, but they would have to join up and become a new player called Joyce.

If the public voted against this, they would both leave and be replaced by new players.

(Image: Channel 4)

As Beth and Jack met for the first time after flirting via a private chat, he was stunned to learn she wasn't the girl in her photos.

Beth claimed she wanted to be the "girl next door" and have people get to know her for her personality, and not her looks.

It was then revealed to them what would be happening, as their future on the show was announced.

(Image: Channel 4)

The duo learned they would be remaining on the show as a team, moving into a flat together.

On arrival, Joyce's profile appeared up on the screen leaving them stunned as they re-entered the game.

But Beth and Jack revealed they are prepared to win, stating they would use their knowledge from the game so far to help them keep up the act.

The Circle airs all week at 10pm on Channel 4, except for Saturdays.
description: The Circle catfish Beth and fellow newcomer Jack learned their fates after being blocked from the show
